longMSG:
You are in the COURTYARD. A crow is cawing.
There is a MAIN GATE that you can use to escape from the mansion.
You may go check the GARDEN at the NORTHWEST side, the GARAGE at the NORTHEAST side, or the LIVING ROOM at the NORTH side.
shortMSG:
You are in the courtyard.
Features: MAIN GATE
Areas you may go to:
NORTHWEST/GARDEN
NORTH/LIVING ROOM
NORTHEAST/GARAGE
